players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Charlie last night and he seemed suspicious. I think the mafioso might be among us."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso. Alice, can you confirm if you saw Charlie last night? We need to gather more evidence."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice, you saw me doing it. Diana, your investigation is incorrect."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
